text: "Forged from the Love of Liberty" is the national anthem of Trinidad and Tobago. ==Lyrics== Forged from the love of liberty In the fires of hope and prayer With boundless faith in our destiny We solemnly declare: Side by side we stand Islands of the blue Caribbean sea, This our native land We pledge our lives to thee. ğ„† Here every creed and race find an equal place, And may God bless our nation. ğ„‡ ==References== Category:North American anthems Category:Trinidad and Tobago
title: Forged from the Love of Liberty
